snippet: Joseph R. Swedish will resign as chief of Trinity Health to take the same position with WellPoint as it goes through changes under the new health care law.
abstract: WellPoint, one of the nation's largest health insurers, hires Joseph R Swedish of Trinity Health, as its chief executive to lead it through sweeping changes created by the federal health care overhaul law.
lead_paragraph: Joseph R. Swedish will resign as chief of Trinity Health to take the same position with WellPoint as it goes through changes under the new health care law.

headline.seo: WellPoint Hires Joseph Swedish of Trinity Health as C.E.O.
headline.main: Big Insurer Hires a Hospital Executive as Chief
headline.print_headline: Big Insurer, WellPoint, Hires Hospital Executive as Chief
